00147 /* Maximums of each type in characters for a standard encoding */
00148 /* WARNING, WARNING
00149    These #define's should be considered deprecated, they will be removed
00150    in a future version of lwes */
00151 #define SHORT_STRING_MAX    255   /*                                          */
00152 #define LONG_STRING_MAX     65535 /*                                          */
00153 #define BYTE_STRING_MAX     2     /*                   00 - FF                */
00154 #define U_INT_16_STRING_MAX 5     /*                    0 - 65535             */
00155 #define INT_16_STRING_MAX   6     /*               -32768 - 32767             */
00156 #define U_INT_32_STRING_MAX 10    /*                    0 - 4294967295        */
00157 #define INT_32_STRING_MAX   11    /*          -2147483648 - 2147483647        */
00158 #define U_INT_64_STRING_MAX 20    /*                  0 - 18446744073709551615*/
00159 #define INT_64_STRING_MAX   20    /*-9223372036854775808 - 9223372036854775807*/
00160 #define BOOLEAN_STRING_MAX  5     /*                 true - false             */
00161 #define IP_ADDR_STRING_MAX  15    /*               xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx            */
00162 
00163 #define MAX_HEADER_LENGTH   22
00164 #define MAX_BODY_LENGTH     65513  /* 65535 - 22                              */
00165 
00166 #ifndef TRUE
00167 #define TRUE 1
00168 #endif
00169 #ifndef FALSE
00170 #define FALSE 0
00171 #endif

00204     LWES_TYPE_U_INT_16  = 1,   
00205     LWES_TYPE_INT_16    = 2,   
00206     LWES_TYPE_U_INT_32  = 3,
